citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 pm on
04-Apr-17.
Licensee was contacted by phone.
Additional Inspectors
Kjos Jeanne, Veterinary Medical Officer
